hudson.plugins.powershell.PowerShell.command:
#parameters for the build $TAG="$env:TAG" $jenkins_app_id="45249771-dc40-4782-b712-6a16c8af251c" $jenkins_tenant_id="1911c65c-893b-42f9-83fa-66c1b86fdf85" $NEW_TAG_WithoutDots="${TAG}.replace(".","")" $target_container_name="arm${NEW_TAG_WithoutDots}" $admin_username="acarm" $container_name="vhds" $VmSize="Standard_A2_v2" $vhd_storage_account="ciresourcegroupstorage" $subnet="Net_172.16.100.0" $vnet_name="CI_Resource_Group" $security_group="createOvocImageSG" $Configurator_vhd_name="ARM-Conf_${TAG}" $Configurator_VmName="ArmConf${TAG}" $Router_vhd_name="ARM-Router_${TAG}" $Router_VmName="ArmRouter${TAG}" $ResourceGroupName="CI_Resource_Group" $conf_base_image="https://${vhd_storage_account}.blob.core.windows.net/${container_name}/${Configurator_vhd_name}.vhd" $router_base_image="https://${vhd_storage_account}.blob.core.windows.net/${container_name}/${Router_vhd_name}.vhd" Write-Output "Converting VHDX to VHD" #convert vhdx to vhd fixed Convert-VHD –Path "$env:WORKSPACE\${Configurator_vhd_name}.vhdx" –DestinationPath "$env:WORKSPACE\${Configurator_vhd_name}.vhd" -VHDType Fixed Convert-VHD –Path "$env:WORKSPACE\${Router_vhd_name}.vhdx" –DestinationPath "$env:WORKSPACE\${Router_vhd_name}.vhd" -VHDType Fixed Write-Output "Creating 2 new VMs on hyper-v" #start a new VMs New-VM -Name "$Configurator_VmName" -SwitchName InternalNAT -MemoryStartupBytes 1GB -VHDPath $env:WORKSPACE\${Configurator_vhd_name}.vhd New-VM -Name "$Router_VmName" -SwitchName InternalNAT -MemoryStartupBytes 1GB -VHDPath $env:WORKSPACE\${Router_vhd_name}.vhd Write-Output "starting the 2 VMs" #start the new VMs Start-VM -name $Configurator_VmName Start-VM -name $Router_VmName #sleep 90 seconds Start-Sleep -s 90 Write-Output "Get VMs IP Address" #get VMs IP Adress $Configurator_vmIP=(Get-VM -Name $Configurator_VmName| Select -ExpandProperty Networkadapters | Select ipaddresses).IPAddresses[0] $Router_vmIP=(Get-VM -Name $Router_VmName| Select -ExpandProperty Networkadapters | Select ipaddresses).IPAddresses[0]
Write-Output "writing IP of the VMS" "Configurator_vmIP=$Configurator_vmIP" | Out-File prop -Encoding ascii "Router_vmIP=$Router_vmIP" | Out-File -append prop -Encoding ascii

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!C:\Program Files\Git\bin\bash --login -i ##!c:\cygwin64\bin\bash --login -i set -e set -x
cd $WORKSPACE #parameters for the build
jenkins_app_id="45249771-dc40-4782-b712-6a16c8af251c" jenkins_tenant_id="1911c65c-893b-42f9-83fa-66c1b86fdf85" NEW_TAG_WithoutDots=${TAG//./} target_container_name="arm${NEW_TAG_WithoutDots}" admin_username="acarm" container_name="vhds" VmSize="Standard_A2_v2" vhd_storage_account="ciresourcegroupstorage" subnet="Net_172.16.100.0" vnet_name="CI_Resource_Group" security_group="createOvocImageSG" Configurator_vhd_name="ARM-Conf_${TAG}" Configurator_VmName="ArmConf${TAG}" Router_vhd_name="ARM-Router_${TAG}" Router_VmName="ArmRouter${TAG}" ResourceGroupName="CI_Resource_Group" conf_base_image="https://${vhd_storage_account}.blob.core.windows.net/${container_name}/${Configurator_vhd_name}.vhd" router_base_image="https://${vhd_storage_account}.blob.core.windows.net/${container_name}/${Router_vhd_name}.vhd" #if it failed to download vhdx file will fail the build
#connect to azure cli az login --service-principal -u ${jenkins_app_id} -p ${jenkins_secret_key} --tenant ${jenkins_tenant_id} export AZCOPY_SPA_CLIENT_SECRET=${jenkins_secret_key} azcopy login --service-principal --application-id=${jenkins_app_id} --tenant-id=${jenkins_tenant_id}
#run pyton scripts
python arm_azure_image_prepare.py $Configurator_vmIP python arm_azure_image_prepare.py $Router_vmIP
#upload created vhds to storage #azcopy copy "${WORKSPACE}/${Configurator_vhd_name}.vhd" "https://${vhd_storage_account}.blob.core.windows.net/${container_name}/${Configurator_vhd_name}.vhd" --blob-type "pageblob" --overwrite #azcopy copy "${WORKSPACE}/${Router_vhd_name}.vhd" "https://${vhd_storage_account}.blob.core.windows.net/${container_name}/${Router_vhd_name}.vhd" --blob-type "pageblob" --overwrite
